titleStmt.title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie vnderstandyng that certayne vayne and vntrue rumours being of late raysed in and about her citie of London, touchyng a decrye of moneys ...
Proclamations. 1562-01-30
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Church yarde, by Richard Iugge, and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation against false reports of decrying money.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
